description: This file defines the Polymer IronA11yKeysBehavior, a behavior for handling accessible keyboard interactions in web components, including key mapping, event handling, and key binding management.

classes.name: Polymer.IronA11yKeysBehavior
classes.description: A Polymer behavior providing normalized keyboard command processing for accessibility, including key mapping, event handling, and key binding management.

methods.name: addOwnKeyBinding
methods.description: Imperatively adds a key binding to the element, associating a key combination with a handler.

methods.name: removeOwnKeyBindings
methods.description: Removes all imperatively added key bindings.

methods.name: keyboardEventMatchesKeys
methods.description: Checks if a keyboard event matches a specified key combination string.
